description: Detects suspicious parent processes that should not have any children or should only have a single possible child program Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Process Parents
query: (process.parent.executable:(*\\notepad.exe OR *\\minesweeper.exe OR *\\winver.exe OR *\\bitsadmin.exe) OR (process.parent.executable:(*\\csrss.exe OR *\\certutil.exe OR *\\schtasks.exe OR *\\eventvwr.exe OR *\\calc.exe) AND (NOT ((process.executable:(*\\WerFault.exe OR *\\wermgr.exe OR *\\conhost.exe OR *\\mmc.exe OR *\\win32calc.exe)) OR (NOT _exists_:process.executable)))))
